border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	前言&nbsp;</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	数据显示的方式可以通过很多控件来实现，例如服务端的原生GridView，第三方控件ComponentArt、Telerik等，客户端的flexgrid, extgrid, easyui, jqgrid等等。在这里我要讲解的是jqgrid，它也是我最近在项目中尝试用到的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我选择使用jqgrid主要是因为它基于jquery ui，在没有美工、契合系统主题并且快速完成系统的前提下，我选择了可以定制theme的jquery ui.</p>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这篇文章主要涉及到jquery ui和jqgrid的使用，我对每一步的讲解都尽量做到细化，结合详细的截图，以期能够通过step by step让初学者们熟悉一些原理和实现步骤。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	文中涉及到一些其他知识点，也做了较为详细的说明，希望这些内容能够对web开发者们有较好的增益作用。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	每一个页面的在线demo我还在配置中，一会儿放出来，可以让大家有个直观的感受。</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; Theme的使用方式&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			4. 主题切换的实现&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			5. 单个页面多主题的实现&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n		</ol>\r\n	</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	一、 Json标准格式和验证<a id=\"a1\" name=\"a1\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	由于自己在使用jqgrid的过程中曾经使用过不规范的json，导致数据jqgrid一直无法显示，所以在此有必要简单讲一下json的标准格式和验证方式。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	虽然在js中字符串也可以用单引号来表示，但是json的标准格式是用双引号把属性和值给括起来的，注意是属性和值(当然数值类型的值可以省去双引号)。下列Json格式中除了最后一条是标准的，前面几条都是不标准的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">    </strong>{ <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;name&#39;</span> : <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;keepfool&#39;</span> }  <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// </span><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">错误格式,proerty和value应用双引号</span>\r\n     { name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;keepfool&#39;</span> }    <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// </span><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">错误格式，property应用双引号括起来，value应用双引号</span>\r\n     { name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;keepfool&quot;</span> }    <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// </span><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">错误格式，property应用双引号括起来</span>\r\n     { <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;name&quot;</span> : <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;keepfool&#39;</span> } <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// </span><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">错误格式，value应用双引号</span>\r\n     { <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;name&quot;</span> : <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;keepfool&quot;</span> } <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 标准格式</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有时候手动生成json格式的字符串，可能会不符合标准，可以通过下面两个在线验证工具执行验证，我推荐使用第一个，因为它能够准确的定位出json串出错的地方，下面的几个例子也是通过第一个在线工具做验证的。</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<a href=\"http://jsonformatter.curiousconcept.com/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://jsonformatter.curiousconcept.com/</a></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<a href=\"http://jsonlint.com/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://jsonlint.com/</a></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">例子1（属性没带引号）：</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs css\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;1&quot;</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">tax</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;10.00&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">total</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;2111.00&quot;</span><font color=\"#008040\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> </font></span>}</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201061006553944.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"399\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11515540N-1.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"990\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">例子3（正确）：</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs json\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n{ &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;1&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">invdate</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;2010-05-24&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">name</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;test&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">note</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;note&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">tax</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;10.00&quot;</span></span>, &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">total</span>&quot;: <span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;2111.00&quot;</span><font color=\"#008040\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> </font></span>}</pre>\r\n<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\" />\r\n<span style=\"color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;</span><a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201061006553355.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"329\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151554943-2.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"981\" /></a><span style=\"color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\" />\r\n<h1 name=\"jquery ui theme的使用\" style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	二、jquery ui theme的使用<a id=\"a2\" name=\"a2\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在文章的开篇我已经提到过jquery ui，它的使用方式我会在下面一步一步列出来，希望对那些还不太会使用jquery ui theme的童鞋们有所帮助。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">1. 项目创建<a id=\"a21\" name=\"a21\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></strong></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在VS下创建一个Web网站或者Web应用程序，创建一个themes目录。如下图：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/20120106100656257.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"330\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151556218-3.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"297\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	2. Base Theme的使用<a id=\"a22\" name=\"a22\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	先到<a href=\"http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/\">http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/</a>下载一个theme，就选那个最基本的灰色调的。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	如果你已经熟悉下面的步骤并且对于下面的步骤不感兴趣，可以直接跳至关键的代码区域</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201061006568796.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"490\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151554600-4.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"671\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	然后会看到下面<a href=\"http://jqueryui.com/download/?themeParams=%3Fctl%3Dthemeroller\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" target=\"_blank\">这个画面</a>，甭管左边有哪些组件，直接download.</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201061006571238.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"491\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11515543X-5.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"928\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	把下载得到的jquery-ui-1.8.16.custom.zip文件解压出来，找到base目录（jquery-ui-1.8.16.customdevelopment-bundle hemesase），将base目录复制到themes文件夹下。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201061006574552.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"681\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/115155NL-6.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"297\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	找到ui目录（jquery-ui-1.8.16.customdevelopment-bundleui），同样将其复制到themes目录下，ui目录包含三部分：&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	(1). jquery ui组件&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	(2). 压缩后的jquery ui组件（在minified文件夹中）&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	(3). 本地化语言文件（i18n）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	现在基本的准备都已经做好了，下面我们来创建第一个页面BaseTheme.html，并演示一个手风琴的效果（accordion组件），请看基础并且关键的步骤：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	(1). 引用jquery ui css</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs bash\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\">&lt;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\">link </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\">rel</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\">=<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\">=<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;themes/base/jquery.ui.all.css&quot;</span> /&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	(2). 引用jquery ui js</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;themes/ui/jquery.ui.widget.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	最终的效果如下图，当然完整的代码已经包含在下载文件中了，您也可以直接运行里面的代码。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/2012010609575640.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML5f95aa\" border=\"0\" height=\"529\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151552192-7.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML5f95aa\" width=\"656\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	3. theme的使用方式<a id=\"a23\" name=\"a23\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Base Theme的使用方式我们已经使用过了，但是这个灰色调的主题可能并不符合您网站的主题色调，不过幸运的是<a href=\"http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/</a>已经为我们提供了很多种不同色调而且比较美观的主题，你可以自行去下载。当然如果你觉得某一款主题看起来不错，但某些样式还需要一些轻微的改动才能应用到自己的程序中，你可以使用Edit去进行编辑，然后生成自己需要的主题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/20120106095757497.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"772\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151551S7-8.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"427\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在第2步中已经列出了jquery ui的使用方式，如果你想换一个主题使用，方式和上面的代码步骤是相同的。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	以lightness主题为例：&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958001628.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	唯一不同之处是对css的引用</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs bash\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有了前面的基础，要实现主题切换已经很简单了，因为我们已经知道jquery theme的关键之处&mdash;&mdash;引用jquery.ui.all.css，请看代码：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 0px;\">\r\n     </span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">$(document).ready(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n     $(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#theme_changer&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">).change(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">).val();\r\n     $(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#theme&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">).attr(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">script</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	效果图：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958011180.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML5c904a\" border=\"0\" height=\"645\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151554L9-11.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML5c904a\" width=\"668\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	5. 单个页面多主题的实现<a id=\"a25\" name=\"a25\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	单个页面多主题的实现需要在<a href=\"http://jqueryui.com/download\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"http://jqueryui.com/download\">http://jqueryui.com/download</a>页面下载时多做一个步骤&mdash;&mdash;<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">指定css scope&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	点开Advanced Theme Settings，指定css scope，一般为css class的命名方式&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958014495.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"579\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151552064-12.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"204\" /></a></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	点击CSS Scope后面的<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958023557.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"22\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151551558-13.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"24\" /></a>&nbsp;按钮，你会发现css scope是专门针对多主题应用。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958023524.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"403\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151552232-14.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958037918.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML586c4a\" border=\"0\" height=\"511\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151551934-15.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	三、jqgrid的使用方式<a id=\"a3\" name=\"a3\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面的两大步都是为了使用jqgrid做准备，冗长的叙述和截图看起来很多，其实知道是jquery ui是怎么回事儿以后就会觉得很简单，步骤也不多。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	jqgrid的项目地址：<a href=\"http://www.trirand.com/blog/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://www.trirand.com/blog/</a>，目前最新的版本是4.3的，也是我正在使用的版本。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<font style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold;\">1. jqgrid的local data使用方式</font><a id=\"a31\" name=\"a31\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">请看代码示例1</strong>：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;gridTable&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">table</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;gridPager&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">div</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	jqgrid有几个较为关键的属性：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		data：指定jqgrid的数据源</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		datatype：数据源的格式&mdash;&mdash;local,javascript,function,json,jsonstring,xml。默认的数据源格式为xml</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		colNames：列名</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		colModels：指定列的属性，例如name用于关联数据源，index用于排序时的索引</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		sortname和sortorder分别指定jqgrid首次加载时的排序字段和排序方式</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		pager：指定分页容器。</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面这个例子的效果如下图：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958048724.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML582493\" border=\"0\" height=\"404\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151551018-16.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML582493\" width=\"702\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<font style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold;\">2. jqgrid的server data之loadonce方式</font><a id=\"a32\" name=\"a32\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	实际的应用中数据都来源于后端，local方式基本不会使用。jqgrid中有一种loadonce的方式，当然后台提供所有的数据，分页、排序功能都由客户端自己去实现。数据少的时候用这种方式是最为快速的，毕竟只做一次请求后台除了输出数据外不需要再写其他的代码了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	请看代码示例：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">type</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;text/javascript&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n     </span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">$(document).ready(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">).jqGrid({\r\n     url : </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     height: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">150</span>,\r\n     rowNum: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span>,\r\n     rowList: [<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;id&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     sortorder: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;desc&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     pager: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;#gridPager&quot;</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     viewrecords: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">true</span></span></span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     caption: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;Manipulating Array Data&quot;</span>\r\n     </span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">});\r\n     });\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">script</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">table</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;gridTable&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">table</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;gridPager&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">div</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这段代码和local data的形式中不同之处在于：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	(1). url：指定了请求的数据源。（test.json文件的内容和第1个例子中的mydata 内容一样）&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	(2). datatype：将数据格式改为json，而不是local&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	(3). loadonce： true（默认情况下为false，显示指定只加载一次数据）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	OK，编译运行，但是结果却没有出现例子1中的效果图，jqgrid里面完全没有数据显示。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">页面LoadOnce.aspx效果：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/20120106095804294.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML57cf5e\" border=\"0\" height=\"404\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151555O0-17.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML57cf5e\" width=\"702\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这时候jqgrid中一个更为关键的属性出现了，jsonReader。既然指定了数据格式为json，那么后端传过来的数据格式总不能我说什么就是什么吧，{&quot;id&quot;:1, &quot;name&quot;:&quot;keepfool&quot;}和{1,&quot;keepfool&quot;}都是正确的json数据，当传到前端时，前端怎么会知道要匹配哪一种形式？jsonReader顾名思义，就是用来读取json的，当然也要给它定个规矩。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	让我们来看看<a href=\"http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:retrieving_data#json_data\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:retrieving_data#json_data</a>中默认的json格式是怎么样的吧</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958089374.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11515564W-18.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"785\" /></a>&nbsp;当没有设置jsonReader属性时，提供的json格式应该是下面这种形式的：&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/20120106095812373.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"413\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151555000-19.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"783\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	它让你指定total,page,records属性（分别对应总页数、当前页、记录总数）；rows属性，还必须指定id和cell属性，cell属性里面仅仅是单元格的值，还不能包括列名。如果按照默认的jsonReader来读取数据，你可能会写出如下构造json的代码：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">class</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">MyOrder </span>: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">IHttpHandler\r\n     </span>{\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">void</span> </span><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(25, 70, 157);\">ProcessRequest</span>(<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">HttpContext </span>context)\r\n     {\r\n     context.Response.ContentType = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;application/json&quot;</span></span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">string</span> </span>sql = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;select top 100 OrderID,CustomerID,ShipName,OrderDate from Orders &quot;</span></span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">DataTable </span>dt = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">SqlHelper</span>.ExecuteDataset(sql).Tables[<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>];\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">IList</span>&lt;<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">object</span></span>&gt; rowObjects = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">List</span>&lt;<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">object</span></span>&gt;();\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 每页显示记录数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>pageSize = <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 记录总数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>rowCount = dt.Rows.Count;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 列数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>columnCount = dt.Columns.Count;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总页数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>pageCount = rowCount%pageSize == <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span> ? rowCount/pageSize : rowCount/pageSize + <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px;
