padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">string</span></span>[columnCount];\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">for</span> </span>(<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> </span>i = <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>; i &lt; cellValue.Length; i++)\r\n     {\r\n     cellValue[i] = dr[i].ToString();\r\n     }\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 创建row对象</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> </span>rowObj = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span>\r\n     </span>{\r\n     id = ID,\r\n     cell = cellValue\r\n     };\r\n     rowObjects.Add(rowObj);\r\n     ID++;\r\n     }\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> </span>resultObj = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span>\r\n     </span>{\r\n     total = pageCount, <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总页数</span>\r\n     </span>page = <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>, <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 由于客户端是loadonce的，page也可以不指定</span>\r\n     </span>records = rowCount, <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总记录数</span>\r\n     </span>rows = rowObjects <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 数据</span>\r\n     </span>};\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">string</span> </span>json = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">JsonConvert</span>.SerializeObject(resultObj);\r\n     context.Response.Write(json);\r\n     }\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">bool</span> </span>IsReusable\r\n     {\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">get</span>\r\n     </span>{\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span></span>;\r\n     }\r\n     }\r\n     }</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">请求页面LoadOnceOrders.aspx效果：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958167992.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML55c96d\" border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/115155J22-20.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML55c96d\" width=\"631\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 102, 0);\">但是这里存在一个小bug，下面的分页按钮不起作用了，当点击排序或者选择每页显示记录数时，分页按钮又可以用了。这个bug仅在loadonce为true时会出现。</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 102, 0);\">在</span><a href=\"http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:options\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 102, 0);\">http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:options</span></a><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 102, 0);\">页面中也对loadonce属性有所说明</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958164023.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"132\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151553L6-21.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"779\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<font style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold;\">3. jqgrid的jsonReader</font><a id=\"a33\" name=\"a33\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面的例子中没有设置jsonReader属性，那么就得按照默认的jsonReader提供json数据。上面的json数据会让我们感觉有一些怪异，rows属性中的id和cell我们不需要，total应该表示为pagecount, records应该表示为total在语义上更易读通，而且row中的每一列都应当是键值对这种形式。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	寻常情况下我们提供的json格式应该是这样的：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs json\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n{\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">pagecount</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span></span>,\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">pageindex</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span></span>,\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">total</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">100</span></span>,\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">rows</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">[\r\n     {\r\n     &quot;<font color=\"#008040\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span></span>,\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">name</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;keepfool&quot;</span>\r\n     </span>},\r\n     {\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">2</span></span>,\r\n     &quot;<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">name</span>&quot;:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;pai&quot;</span>\r\n     </span>}\r\n     ...\r\n     ]\r\n</font></span>}</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	pagecount表示总页数，pageindex表示当前页，total表示总记录数,rows表示记录。既然这样，我们的jsonReader就得改写，而且后台也应当提供这样的数据。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">LoadOnceOrder2.aspx</strong>页面的jsonReader（其他设置和LoadOnceOrders.aspx页面一致）</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs css\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">jsonReader</span>: <span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">{\r\n     <span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">root</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;rows&quot;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     page: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;pageindex&quot;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     total: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;pagecount&quot;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     records: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;total&quot;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     repeatitems: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\">false</span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     id: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;0&quot;</span>\r\n</span>}</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">请注意这里的repeatitems属性，当repeatitems=false时，jqgrid会根据返回的json数据搜索列名，这个列名对应colModel中的名字&nbsp;</strong><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	为LoadOnceOrder2.aspx页面提供Json数据的MyOrder2.ashx的http处理程序</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">class</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">MyOrder2 </span>: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">IHttpHandler\r\n     </span>{\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">void</span> </span><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(25, 70, 157);\">ProcessRequest</span>(<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">HttpContext </span>context)\r\n     {\r\n     context.Response.ContentType = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;application/json&quot;</span></span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">string</span> </span>sql = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;select top 100 OrderID,CustomerID,ShipName,OrderDate from Orders &quot;</span></span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">DataTable </span>dt = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">SqlHelper</span>.ExecuteDataset(sql).Tables[<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>];\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 每页显示记录数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>pageSize = <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 记录总数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>rowCount = dt.Rows.Count;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总页数</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">int</span> </span>pageCount = rowCount % pageSize == <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span> ? rowCount / pageSize : rowCount / pageSize + <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>;\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> </span>resultObj = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">DataResult\r\n     </span>{\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总页数</span>\r\n     </span>PageCount = pageCount,\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 当前页</span>\r\n     </span>PageIndex = <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>,\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 总记录数</span>\r\n     </span>Total = rowCount,\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 数据</span>\r\n     </span>Data = dt\r\n     };\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">string</span> </span>resultJson = <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(43, 145, 175);\">JsonHelper</span>.Serialize(resultObj);\r\n     context.Response.Write(resultJson);\r\n     }\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">public</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">bool</span> </span>IsReusable\r\n     {\r\n     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">get</span> </span>{ <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span></span>; }\r\n     }\r\n     }</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	DataResult类的代码很简单：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; padding: 0px;\">///</span> <span class=\"hljs-xmlDocTag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">&lt;summary&gt;</span></span>\r\n     <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\"><span class=\"hljs-xmlDocTag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">///</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: green;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">数据</span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: gray;\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\"><span class=\"hljs-xmlDocTag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">///</span> <span class=\"hljs-xmlDocTag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">&lt;/summary&gt;</span></span>\r\n     </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">get</span></span>; <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">set</span></span>; }\r\n     }</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	JsonHelper类是通过JSON.NET实现对象序列化和反序列化的一个帮助类，这里我用它来的Serialize方法序列化DataResult对象，它的代码我就不贴出来了，在下载的源代码中已经包含了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面再介绍一种jsonReader用法，这种用法是函数形式的，也是我个人最推崇这种用法：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\njsonReader: {\r\n     repeatitems: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span></span>,\r\n     root: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(obj)</span> {</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> </span>obj.rows; },\r\n     page: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(obj)</span> {</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> </span>obj.pageindex; },\r\n     total: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(obj)</span> {</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> </span>obj.pagecount; },\r\n     records: <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(obj)</span> {</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: blue;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> </span>obj.total; }\r\n}</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	观察一下上面所提供的寻常json写法，你会发现json数据对象里面包含rows, pageindex, pagecount,total属性，而后台输出到前端的function函数中得到的是obj对象，那么用obj.rows, obj.pageindex, obj.pagecount, obj.total就会觉得一目了然。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<font style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-weight: bold;\">4.&nbsp; jqgird的server data之最终解决方案</font><a id=\"a34\" name=\"a34\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(33, 117, 155);\"></a></h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面的分页和排序都因为loadonce=true属性而导致客户端帮我们做了大部分的事情，但是loadonce存在bug，当数据量很大时，一次性加载有所数据不仅速度太慢，如果传输的json数据超过4MB时会抛出异常（可以在web.config中设置大小）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	要解决这个问题，我们只有通过服务端来操控分页数据，而不是一次性丢给客户端所有的数据，也就是说客户端请求哪一页的数据服务端就提供那一页的几条数据给客户端。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	到了这里，我要介绍最后一个jqgrid很重要的属性&mdash;&mdash;prmNames</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958174513.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"608\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1151555359-22.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"855\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在<a href=\"http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:options\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://www.trirand.com/jqgridwiki/doku.php?id=wiki:options</a>中对prmNames的介绍很详细，我们只用看标记部分，prmNames是发起请求时发送到服务端的参数数组。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	我们现在只关心4个参数的设定，page,rows,sort和order，不用它的默认设置，我们自己将prmNames设置为如下的形式：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs css\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">prmNames</span>: <span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">{\r\n     <span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">page</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;PageNumber&#39;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     rows: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;PageSize&#39;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     sort: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;OrderBy&#39;</span></span></span></span></span><span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">,\r\n     order: </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(163, 21, 21);\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Sort&#39;</span>\r\n     </span>}</pre>\r\n<span style=\"color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">那么一个发送到服务端的请求可能是这样的</span><font color=\"#4f81bd\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">mydata.ashx?PageNumber=1&amp;PageSize=10&amp;OrderBy=OrderID&amp;Sort=desc</font>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	注意这里的rows，由于我们每一页的分页数据都是向服务器发送请求取得的，所以这里的rows对应为PageSize</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在此之前我们先看看我们最终的效果图：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201201/201201060958178351.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"SNAGHTML54fe9b\" border=\"0\" height=\"456\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/115155M10-23.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"SNAGHTML54fe9b\" width=\"631\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">①.排序 ②.分页 ③. 记录</strong>这三个地方的功能都是正常的无误的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我还是按照step by step的方式来介绍这个实现过程。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	(1) 分页存储过程</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	分页数据通过执行存储过程来得到，以获取订单为例（数据库为Northwind）：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs perl\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	(2) PagingParameters类</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	既然有了客户端提供的prmNames参数，那么后台总得有个东西来接收它们吧。那好，在这儿我们定义一个PagingParameters类，用来管理分页参数。现在PagingParameters类已经拥有4个属性了：PageNumber, PageSize, OrderBy, Sort。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这些参数还不够，存储过程中的@Where参数和@Total参数总需要吧，那么再加两个属性Where,Total。但是这些参数还不够，存储过程SP_GetOrdersByPage是对Order进行分页的，如果我要对Category分页，那是不是该提供一个SP_GetCategoriesByPage这种存储过程呢？所以这儿还需要一个参数ProcedureName。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	稍作整理后，PagingParameters类的代码如下：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果ajax分页用到的场合不止一处，就干脆写个抽象的http处理程序吧，代码我就不解释了，看注释应该很容易弄明白的。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs cs\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('40','29','<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	前言</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	打开浏览器，输入一个网址，显示一个页面，页面最基本的布局和框架用户一目了然。但是用户所用的浏览器、显示器、分辨率大多都是不一样的，如何确保不同用户持有不同设备所看到同一个网址的页面显示内容相同呢？当然像亚马逊首页那一种布局会更个性化一些，它会根据用户持有设备的屏幕大小而现实内容。例如：一部PC机上可能一排现实5个商品，一部iPad上可能显示3个商品，而一部手机上可能一排只显示1个商品。至少不要 出现如下这种情况，在符合W3C标准的浏览器中显示正常，而在IE6,7中页面乱套，因为IE6,7仍然拥有很庞大的用户群；即使你做的Web应用是面向某些企业用户的，这种情况下用户较少，但你也不能强求用户使用哪一种浏览器。要解决这个问题，这就需要用到页面布局中的自适应，虽然这个问题看起来很简单。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我在这里将会介绍三种我最近在项目中用到的自适应：</p>\r\n<ol style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0px 30px; padding-right: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">页面整体宽度自适应</strong></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">iframe宽高自适应</strong></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">jqgrid高度自适应</strong>\r\n		<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228);\">\r\n			页面整体宽度自适应</h1>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			先看看下面的页面基本布局图</p>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201112/201112261556437249.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(255, 99, 71);\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"674\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/13261UP1-0.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px;\" width=\"598\" /></a></p>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			页面分为三个部分：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			(1) Header，这一部分宽度自适应<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			(2) Left 左边栏，为定宽200px，一般为菜单或导航<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			(3) Right右侧主内容区域，宽度自适应</p>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			既然做了分解，我们就把它当做需求来一步一步实现它吧，首先是Header区域。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			请看<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">代码1</strong></span>：</p>\r\n		<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 5px; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); overflow: auto; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important;\">\r\n			<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n				<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; text-decoration: underline; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/132AJ150-1.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 700px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n		</div>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			关键的代码只有一行，我已经标出。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n			现在有一个问题了，如果Header的内容也比较丰富，可能Logo + Banner的总宽度为1000px了，但有些小屏幕却看不完整，这时我们得为这个Header 加个最小宽度限制。<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 128);\">在IE 7 +和W3C浏览器中，拥有一个min-width属性可以实现这个效果，但是IE6不支持</span>（<a href=\"http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc351024%28v=vs.85%29.aspx#positioning\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" target=\"_blank\">参照各版本IE浏览器CSS兼容性列表</a>）。不过css expression可以帮我们解决这个问题，请看<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">代码2</strong></span>：</p>\r\n		<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 5px; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); overflow: auto; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important;\">\r\n			<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n				<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; text-decoration: underline; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/132AJ150-1.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 700px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n			<pre class=\"hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.2656px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n			<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n				<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; text-decoration: underline; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/132AJ150-1.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 700px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n		</div>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			在代码2中我并没有直接更改#header用margin属性来控制，虽说margin:0 auto可以来控制居中自适应，但是如果需要页边距为30像素时用margin: 0 30px则不行了了（在Firefox满屏是可以的，但浏览器缩小时，左侧nargin是存在的，而右侧被吃掉了）</p>\r\n		<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			OK，现在已经实现Header部分的居中自适应了，下面的Left和Right也不会麻烦。虽然上面的Header层使用了expression来实现宽度自适应，但是下面的Right层则不能使用同样的方式，因为Header层依赖的是body，而Right层则不是。<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">如果不考虑IE6的存在</span></strong>，则用如下代码就可以实现本文开头的布局图。请看<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">代码3</strong></span>：</p>\r\n		<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n				<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; padding: 0px;\">\r\n			红色部分标出的是关键代码，又回到之前的问题了，min-width属性在IE6中不支持，所以你在IE6中运行代码3将得不到我们预期的结果。那么，现在就要借助js来实现这个效果了。请看<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">代码4</span></strong>： 代码中有几处要注意的地方，我在下图中有标注出来，要查看运行结果，请复制上面的代码保存为html，所有url都是外部链接。<br />\r\n			<img alt=\"\" class=\"code_img_opened\" id=\"code_img_opened_764b53d6-85c0-4b80-803f-808857c7ede5\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1330035124-7.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">{</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">/*</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;min-width</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">:</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">1000px</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">/*</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&nbsp;用CSS表达式让IE6也支持最小宽度&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;/</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">script</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">head</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">body</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">div&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">id</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">=&quot;container&quot;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">div&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">id</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">=&quot;header&quot;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span></div>\r\n			<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n				<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; text-decoration: underline; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1330032Z1-8.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 700px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n		</div>\r\n	</li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201112/201112261556442397.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"1567\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/14594215B-10.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px;\" width=\"1062\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	第一部分终于讲完了，呼~~~。</p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	iframe宽高自适应</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有了前面的基础，要做iframe的宽高自适应就很简单了。iframe高度自适应是根据屏幕的高度来的（无滚动条），宽度自适应已经通过前面的方式实现了，高度自适应只需要对height属性进行计算处理就可以实现。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	根据上面提供的代码，要更改的地方很少。这里有一个完整的iframe例子下载：<a href=\"http://files.cnblogs.com/keepfool/iframe.zip\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" target=\"_blank\">iframe auto width and height demo</a>，代码可以直接看里面的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	无图无真相，还是截个图看看吧。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/keepfool/201112/201112261556465594.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"366\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/14594264U-11.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px;\" width=\"604\" /></a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	jqgrid高度自适应</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	jqgrid是一个较为强大的表格控件，对于它的介绍为不再赘述，至于它的用法和结合asp.net进行ajax分页的方式我将在下一篇讲述（不是loading once的方式，loading once存在一些bug）。由于上面的iframe高度已经根据屏幕的高度做了限制，而jqgrid提供了一页显示10,20,30条这种类似的选项，原有的高度是不可能让30条数据显示完全的。这就需要为jqgrid限制一个最大高度，例如300px，当内容的高度超出300px时，jqgrid就得以竖向滚动条滑动来显示内容。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	假定我们已经为jqgrid绑定好数据源，jqgrid的高度为360px。要实现兼容所有浏览器的jqgrid高度自适应，我们现在还需借助一个东西，<a href=\"http://noteslog.com/post/how-to-fix-the-resize-event-in-ie/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://noteslog.com/post/how-to-fix-the-resize-event-in-ie/</a>，其实还是为了<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">解决IE resize的bug</span>。</p>\r\n<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 5px; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); overflow: auto; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important;\">\r\n	<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n		<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue; text-decoration-line: underline; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1459424645-12.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 700px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n	<pre class=\"csharpcode hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.2656px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span></span>\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">html</span> </span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&quot;http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml&quot;</span></span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span></span>\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">head</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&gt;</span></span>\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128); line-height: 1.5 !important;\">&lt;</span></span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 0); line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这样的代码难免会出现，但不要大片的出现在PHP代码中，一个function里面不要到处都是这种嵌套的if else结构，它毕竟不是算法。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	也许你是为了测试mysql的性能，也许你只是为了看看它什么时候能挂掉。Mysql不是爹，它坑不起。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">if</span> </span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">(</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(127, 0, 85);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	当大量的echo出现在你的PHP代码中时，应当考虑使用模板引擎了，推荐你使用<a href=\"http://www.smarty.net/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" target=\"_blank\">Smarty模板引擎</a>。或者include一个文本文件，PHP将直接输出这些html代码。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	注意最后一句代码，它可能会毁掉你整个系统！如果这段不是你加入的，那么你可能已经被入侵了。请记住 几个原则</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		1、永远都不要尝试使用 eval 函数</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		2、永远都不要直接使用<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp;</span><code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">$_GET</code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp;</span>和<span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp;</span><code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">$_POST</code><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp;</span>等用户输入的 变量。</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 64, 0);\">Example 9</span><span class=\"Apple-converted-space\">&nbsp;</span>过多的条件判断</h3>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs php\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('42','20','<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在<a href=\"http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpexcelreader\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">Sourceforge</a>上提供了一个开源的PHP导入Excel数据的类，在下载的项目中也提供了简单的示例。下面我做了一些简易的包装，让PHP导入Excel数据用起来更为简便。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	首先看看示例代码，了解一下Excel Reader的基本使用方式（按照下面的注释step by step）</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Consolas; max-height: 600px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: dashed dashed dashed solid; border-color: rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(255, 153, 0) rgb(108, 226, 108); border-image: initial; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"hljs-preprocessor\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;?php</span>\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(85, 127, 95);\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 1.引用ExcelReader类文件</span>\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> </span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Spreadsheet_Excel_Reader();\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(85, 127, 95);\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(85, 127, 95);\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 4.读取指定的excel</span>\r\n</span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$i</span> &lt;= <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$data</span>-&gt;sheets[<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>][</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;numRows&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">]; <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$i</span>++) { </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(85, 127, 95);\"><span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 遍历行</span>\r\n    </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$j</span> &lt;= <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$data</span>-&gt;shee</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">ts[<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>][<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(127, 0, 85);\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">echo</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;\\&quot;&quot;</span></span></span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">.<span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$data</span>-&gt;sheets[<span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>][</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;cells&#39;</span></span></span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">][<span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$i</span>][<span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$j</span>].</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;\\&quot;,&quot;</span></span></span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">;\r\n    }\r\n    </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(127, 0, 85);\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">echo</span> </span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 192);\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;\\n&quot;</span></span></span><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">;\r\n}\r\n\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: red;\"><span class=\"php\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-preprocessor\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">?&gt;</span></span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这个简单的例子只是输出了Excel中每个单元格的值，我们还需要拼接sql语句最终将这些值插入到数据库中，而且当Excel的第一行为列头时，这一行数据是不能够插入到数据表中的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面的步骤就来演示这一简单过程。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	1. 创建数据库，数据表</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs sql\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	2. 拼接sql</p>\r\n<pre class=\"code hljs xml\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(25, 70, 157);\">trimEnd</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(<span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$strEnd</span> ? substr ( <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$str</span>, <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">0</span>, strlen ( <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">$str</span> ) - strlen ( <span class=\"hljs-variable\" style=\"margin: 0px;
