padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">public</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; . <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">$errorNum</span> . &#39;:&#39; . <span style=\"margin: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">$errorFile</span> . &#39; on &#39; . <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">14</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">    }\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">15</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">}\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">16</span> \r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">17</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">set_error_handler</span>([&#39;ErrorClass&#39;, &#39;myError&#39;<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">]);\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">18</span> \r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">19</span> \r\n<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">20</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">try</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"> {\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">21</span>     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">$a</span> = 5/0<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">;\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">22</span> } <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">catch</span> (<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">Exception</span> <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 0, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">$e</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">) {\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">23</span>     <span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">echo</span> &quot;666666&quot;<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">;\r\n</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128); font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important; line-height: 1.5 !important;\">24</span> }</pre>\r\n	<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n		<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; text-decoration: underline; transition: all 0.5s linear; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1635104G6-0.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 900px; border: none !important;\" /></a></span></div>\r\n</div>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	访问结果：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"373\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16351010G-7.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: none; max-width: 900px;\" width=\"602\" /></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　由结果可知：我们自定义的myError方法截取了错误，此时我们可以主动的处理这些错误，抛出相应的异常。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　但是我们需要注意以下两点：</p>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　第一，如果存在该方法，相应的error_reporting()就不能在使用了。它将接管PHP原生错误处理函数，即所有的错误都会交给自定义的函数处理。</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　第二，此方法不能处理以下级别的错误：E_ERROR、 E_PARSE、 E_CORE_ERROR、 E_CORE_WARNING、 E_COMPILE_ERROR、 E_COMPILE_WARNING，set_error_handler() 函数所在文件中产生的E_STRICT，该函数只能捕获系统产生的一些Warning、Notice级别的错误。</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span data-wiz-span=\"data-wiz-span\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">注意：</span></strong></span></div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	<span data-wiz-span=\"data-wiz-span\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">　　</span>如果在脚本执行前发生错误，由于此时自定义的错误处理函数还没有注册，因此就用不到这个自定义错误处理程序。</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; text-align: right;\">\r\n	<a href=\"https://www.cnblogs.com/phpstudy2015-6/p/8433541.html#_labelTop\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; transition: all 0.5s linear;\">回到顶部</a><a name=\"_label4\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\"></a></div>\r\n<h4 style=\"padding: 5px 0px 5px 20px; font-size: 17px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgb(95, 90, 75) 0px 0px 0px 1px, rgba(10, 10, 0, 0.498039) 1px 1px 6px 1px; font-family: 微软雅黑, 宋体, 黑体, Arial; height: 25px; line-height: 25px; text-shadow: rgb(34, 34, 34) 2px 2px 3px; margin: 15px 0px !important; background: rgb(43, 102, 149) !important; border-radius: 6px !important;\">\r\n	　　3.2、register_shutdown_function(exception_function)&nbsp;</h4>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　捕获PHP的错误：Fatal Error、Parse Error等，<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(0, 255, 255);\">这个方法是PHP脚本执行结束前最后一个调用的函数</span>，比如脚本错误、die()、exit、异常、正常结束都会调用。</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　通过这个函数就可以在脚本结束前判断这次执行是否有错误产生，这时就要借助于一个函数：error_get_last()；这个函数可以拿到本次执行产生的所有错误。error_get_last();返回的信息：</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　[type] &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;- 错误类型<br data-filtered=\"filtered\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	　　[message] &nbsp; &nbsp;- 错误消息<br data-filtered=\"filtered\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	　　[file]&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; - 发生错误所在的文件<br data-filtered=\"filtered\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	　　[line] &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - 发生错误所在的行</div>\r\n<div style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	注意：当parse-time出错时是不会调用本函数的。只有在run-time出错的时候，才会调用本函数。即需要成功注册此函数才能使用。【测试3和测试4对比】</div>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;eg.</p>\r\n<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 5px; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); overflow: auto; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-radius: 5px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot; !important;\">\r\n	<div class=\"cnblogs_code_toolbar\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n		<span class=\"cnblogs_code_copy\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 5px 0px 0px; line-height: 1.5 !important;\"><a style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; text-decoration: underline; transition: all 0.5s linear; border: none !important;\" title=\"复制代码\"><img alt=\"复制代码\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1635104G6-0.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	测试1：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	测试2：（使用echo &quot;string&quot;;替换try....catch）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1635104936-11.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: none; max-width: 900px;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	测试3：（使用echo &quot;string&quot;替换try...catch）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	此时语法错误，register_shutdown_function函数未执行</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16351054L-12.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	测试4：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	新建一个文件，具有语法错误的php代码，并将其引入执行文件中，例如</p>\r\n<div class=\"cnblogs_code\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px; margin: 15px 0px !important; background: rgb(43, 102, 149) !important; border-radius: 6px !important;\">\r\n	　　3.3、set_exception_handler(exception_function)</h4>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<table style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-collapse: collapse; padding: 3px; border-style: solid; border-color: silver; border-collapse: collapse;\">\r\n				error_function</td>\r\n			<td style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 3px; border-style: solid; border-color: silver; border-collapse: collapse;\">\r\n				必需。规定未捕获的异常发生时调用的函数。<br data-filtered=\"filtered\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				该函数必须在调用 set_exception_handler() 函数之前定义。<br data-filtered=\"filtered\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n				这个异常处理函数需要需要一个参数，即抛出的 exception 对象。</td>\r\n		</tr>\r\n	</tbody>\r\n</table>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	作用：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　set_exception_handler() 函数设置用户自定义的异常处理函数。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　该函数用于创建运行时期间的用户自己的异常处理方法。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	　　该函数会返回旧的异常处理程序，若失败，则返回 null。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: rgb(0, 255, 255);\">提示：在这个异常处理程序被调用后，脚本会停止执行。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px auto; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	不在1:1分辨率下也能保持像素完美，可以通过创建网格线来避免虚边的出现。&nbsp;<strong>编辑&nbsp;</strong><strong>＞&nbsp;首选项&nbsp;＞</strong>&nbsp;<strong>参考线、网格和切片</strong>&nbsp;保持尺寸为偶数。<br />\r\n	例如：设置网格线间隔为64px，子网格为64</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	使用网格在画图形时会自动吸附，不是1:1状态下也可以画出完美像素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644053R6-1.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	Photoshop cs6中比较恼人的一点是当你选中一个形状图层的时候形状的路径会显示出来，并且在你操作该图层的时候路径会一直存在，譬如在更改图层混合选项的时候。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16440543I-4.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>4. 使用内阴影更容易增加精致感</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644052Q9-5.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>5. 保存样式</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	保存多次使用的样式到样式面板，这样免去每次都复制粘贴的麻烦</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/164405N14-6.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>6.以15&deg;的步长旋转和10像素的移动</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	在自由旋转的时候，可以按住Shift以15&deg;的倍数旋转。移动时以10像素移动。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16440543U-7.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>7. 设置全局光为90&deg;</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	当光源在90&deg;的时候高光、阴影以及其他图层效果看起来最好。为了避免重复设置，在混合选项中<strong>（斜面和浮雕、内发光和阴影）勾选使用全局光</strong>。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644052064-8.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>8. 创建图层的时候你便对它进行命名</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	将设计稿发给重构之前对图层命名是件令人头痛的事情。因此不妨形成在创建图层的同时就给它命名的习惯。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16440524Q-9.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>9. 使用径向渐变</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	使用径向渐变有时候会看起来光达不到你想要的大小。试试使用角度和缩放来调整达到你要的效果。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644055S9-10.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644055200-11.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	还可以用鼠标拖动光圈的位置</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/164405N03-12.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>10. 避免图层名添加后缀和图层效果扩张</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	每次复制图层都在图层名称后面添加&ldquo;副本&rdquo;的字眼很是恼火？<br />\r\n	同时恼火的是每次复制粘贴图层效果的时候图层效果就会扩张？<br />\r\n	可以图层面板选项中将两者关闭。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/164405G35-13.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>11. 努力做到非破坏的编辑</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	通过使用智能对象和使用形状路径工具来画图做到一个非破坏性的工作流程。 当你发现自己需要重复编辑同样东西的时候这会帮你减少很多痛苦。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1644053419-14.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>12.&nbsp;使用图层复合在同一文件中展示不同的页面</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	你是将所有页面都创建在一个PSD中然后对图层可视进行打开和关闭来查看吗？<br />\r\n	此时图层复合就可帮助解决这个问题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	勾选<strong>窗口</strong><strong>&nbsp;＞&nbsp;</strong><strong>图层复合</strong>即可打开图层复合面板。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16440540T-15.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>13.奇怪的投影尺寸</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	Photoshop的怪异之处，投影增加了尺寸。投影的大小值设置为1px或者2px，投影将会产生同样的尺寸，如下图所示。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/164405OE-16.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>14 .使用智能参考线来进行更为完美的对齐</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	让Photoshop对你的元素进行智能对齐。 在<strong>视图</strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong>＞&nbsp;</strong><strong>显示</strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong>＞&nbsp;</strong><strong>智能参考线</strong>处打开。一旦你使用过智能参考线，你会再也离不开它了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/164405G32-17.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>15. 在对文件作重大改变之前备份文件</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	当你发现保存了自己不想要的变化，或者在撤销更改之前意外地关闭了文件，备份文件会大大减少你的痛苦。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>16. &nbsp;双屏时调整同一个psd</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	在双屏时不同的屏会有色差，可以通过双屏打开同一个psd来对比调整。<br />\r\n	打开一个psd后，选择<strong>&nbsp;窗口</strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong>＞&nbsp;</strong><strong>排列</strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong>＞&nbsp;</strong><strong>为&rdquo;XXX.psd&ldquo;新建窗口&nbsp;</strong>。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/16440531Y-18.png\" style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 850px; height: auto; overflow: hidden;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	<strong>17.创建一个icon库</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Tahoma, Arial, Verdana, SimSun; font-size: 15px;\">\r\n	把你针对工具栏或者标签栏创建了矢量的icon，保存一份icon（保存完好无损的尺寸以便于编辑）到单独的PSD文件中，这样，你便不必下次再使用这些icon时到处寻找了。</p>\r\n','','','127.0.0.1','','');
